data.title: Ontario's largest online high school
data.meta_description: Learn at home. Earn high school credits or your high school diploma (OSSD) online with TVO ILC, Ontarioâ€™s largest online accredited high school.
data.text:
Founded as a not-for-profit with a mission to bring advanced learning to Ontarians, we make courses interactive and interesting so you can best reach your goals, whatever they may be.

Start any time, according to your own schedule. With no set classes, you can study whenever and wherever you want. You have up to 10 months to complete whichever of our 144 innovative, media-rich courses you choose.

As an Ontario resident, you can study with TVO ILC for just $40 per course.

Students already enrolled in an Ontario high school should speak to their guidance counsellor. Prices may vary.

Since 1926, TVO ILC has been the distance learning partner of the Ontario Ministry of Education. We are diploma-granting, recognized by all Canadian Colleges and Universities.

TVO ILC student applications to Ontario universities & colleges are processed through OUAC and OCAS.

Our experienced academic advisors help you navigate your learning and grade your assignments; and caring guidance counsellors are available to support you as you plan for your future. We are always here to help you reach your goals.

Start any time, according to your own schedule. With no set classes, you can study whenever and wherever you want. You have up to 10 months to complete whichever of our 144 innovative, media-rich courses you choose.

As an Ontario resident, you can study with TVO ILC for just $40 per course.

Students already enrolled in an Ontario high school should speak to their guidance counsellor. Prices may vary.
